generated_body: The article likely discusses the life and legacy of the last known Pearl Harbor survivor who recently passed away at the age of 98. Readers can expect an overview of the individual’s experiences during the attack on Pearl Harbor, possibly highlighting their personal story and contributions to history. The piece may also touch upon the broader significance of their passing, reflecting on the dwindling number of World War II veterans and the importance of remembering their sacrifices. Additionally, it could include insights into memorials or tributes planned to honor their memory.
